item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Dang, my dudes, I absolutely loved this graphic novel. It’s set the bar on dirty comics. I’ve always looked up to both Emilee Denich (aka Ghostgreen, as they’ve previously appeared here on ol’ OJST) for her stunning comics work and Spike Trotman has been one of my favorite author/cartoonists since our days on a now […]
item.content:encoded:
Yes, Roya.

by Matthew Nolan on 07/18/2017 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Kinks »
  • Literature »
  • Porn & Websites »
  • Review Comics

Dang, my dudes, I absolutely loved this graphic novel. It’s set the bar on dirty comics. I’ve always looked up to both Emilee Denich (aka Ghostgreen, as they’ve previously appeared here on ol’ OJST) for her stunning comics work and Spike Trotman has been one of my favorite author/cartoonists since our days on a now defunct comics subscription site back in the early 00s.

Haha, I have so, so, so much more to say about this about this book that didn’t fit in the comic! Maybe when I have more free time (LOL) I’ll write a bit more as a blog post? But don’t hold me to that. But do go pick this book even if you’re not into femdom. It’s just straight-up a good book and one of my most favorite comics I’ve ever read.

item.title: Severin
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: I’m very fond of these butt plugs. It’s how I cut my teeth and got started with backdoor exploration, so they hold some serious sentimental value even if I’m not using them often anymore. Now’a’days, if I feel like playing with my butt, an Aneros, Njoy or Fuze is my go-to. But I still think […]
item.content:encoded:
Severin

by Matthew Nolan on 07/11/2017 at 12:01 am
  • Anal Toys »
  • Comic »
  • Review Comics

I’m very fond of these butt plugs. It’s how I cut my teeth and got started with backdoor exploration, so they hold some serious sentimental value even if I’m not using them often anymore. Now’a’days, if I feel like playing with my butt, an Aneros, Njoy or Fuze is my go-to. But I still think the small and medium Severins are an amazing cheap set for those looking to train their butts to take shapes. The small is a fantastic introduction to butt play and the medium a great intermediate.

Buy one from one of our Friends (With Benefits)

  • USA
  • Tantus
  • Stockroom
Stockroom ALSO has a 15% discount for you, just add ‘OHJOY’ at checkout!
And, finally while we much prefer and encourage you to buy from a small
business, here’s an Amazon link!
  • Amazon

As mentioned before – I would avoid the large; that base just isn’t confidence building and the medium is pretty darn big already. Erika didn’t have much input on the plugs – the toy’s been so hidden in our cabinet these past years that she’s only recently seen them and not had time to try them out yet. So this review is alllll Matt.

Gosh, I love it when we get to include some personal story into our reviews – it’s so fun to work on =D

Also. How great is the name Severin? It’s supposed to mean ‘the most beautiful kind of boy’ but it just sounds like ‘Severus Snape’ and ‘Slytherin’ to me. Kinda give me the fun, gay Harry Potter feels <3

item.title: Sofia
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: The Sofia is my first FULL silicone sleeve. Every other toy I’ve put my cock into has been made from TCP or CyberSkin or some sort of proprietary soft material. Silicone is a master material for any kind of penetration toy. It’s non-porous, lasts ages, and you can pour it into any kind of mold. […]
item.content:encoded:
Sofia

by Matthew Nolan on 07/04/2017 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Penis Toys »
  • Review Comics

The Sofia is my first FULL silicone sleeve. Every other toy I’ve put my cock into has been made from TCP or CyberSkin or some sort of proprietary soft material. Silicone is a master material for any kind of penetration toy. It’s non-porous, lasts ages, and you can pour it into any kind of mold. But it’s SUPER firm and dense, and making a sleeve to penetrate out of it brings up issues for me and my delicate peen.

  • Sofia
  • Bad Dragon

If you pick up a Sofia, you’re going to have a sleeve that lasts you a lifetime and gives as good as it gets. But don’t go in expecting a soft and plushy experience. Fucking this is NOTHING like fucking a Fleshlight and definitely not like a real person. It’s unique and different. I… Like it? Maybe? Kinda not? I’m honestly not sure. It’s… an experience.

If my notes about the Sofia being a bit plain-looking are a deterrent, do make sure to check out some of their other sleeves, BD has a crazy collection! When picking this one out, I simply asked the Bad Dragon team for their favorite. In hindsight, I might have been more keen for a visually interesting one like the Twitch.

Regardless, I love getting to review different and exotic toys like this. It gives me a “What is my life?” moment, and it was a blast to write a script with a gecko-character in it for Erika to draw =D
‘You want me to draw WHAT?’
‘Yup. AND a giant fantasy serpent cock… you’re WELCOME, honey.’

Also! Erika is holding a blind auction to benefit Scarleteen with this embroidery piece she made! Get your bids in July 3 – 7!

Yes, this IS the same piece Erika was working on in her Hourly Comic Day comic from last year. And Scarleteen is, of course, the best comprehensive sex education you can find on the internet. It’s one of our top research resources that we use for our educational comics and if you want to support them but you don’t actually want any embroidery out of it, by all means, go make a donation to them right now!

UPDATE July 12: Our auction raised $295.10 for Scarleteen!!!! Thanks, everyone!

└ Tags: anthro, bad dragon, furry, masturbation, masturbation sleeve, review, sleeve, Sofia

But we’re here for you: PCOS is not the end of the world! If you’re seeing some of these potential symptoms in yourself, don’t go leaping to any conclusions. Just go see a doctor!

Everybody else? Go drop Ainsley some love for this fantastic breakdown and educational comic:

item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: There is so, so, so much more to know about The Pill and we only had time to skim the surface! Please read through the following sites and then donate some dollaz so they (Planned Parenthood and Scarleteen) can continue to be free, accessible, comprehensive sex education resources on the internet :) Birth Control Bingo: […]
item.content:encoded:
The Pill

by Matthew Nolan on 06/20/2017 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Education Comics »
  • Favorites »
  • Health

There is so, so, so much more to know about The Pill and we only had time to skim the surface! Please read through the following sites and then donate some dollaz so they (Planned Parenthood and Scarleteen) can continue to be free, accessible, comprehensive sex education resources on the internet :)

Birth Control Bingo: Minipills on Scarleteen
Birth Control Bingo: The Combination Pill on Scarleteen
Birth Control Pill on Planned Parenthood

Not sure where to even start when it comes to picking the birth control that’s right for you? Scarleteen has JUST the choose-your-own-adventure-er-I-mean-birth-control game for you over at their Birth Control Bingo resource.

We’ve also covered a few other birth control options here on ol’ OJST!
The Paraguard IUD (this is the BC I’m on!), Emergency Contraception, The Implant by Lucy Knisley, Condom Basics, The Internal (Female) Condom, aaaaaand in order to understand how contraception works you should prolly brush up on how folks get pregnant in the first place.

└ Tags: babies, baby, bc, birth control, birthcontrol, Combination, contraception, daily, estrogen, menstrual, Minipill, ovulation, pill, pregnancy, pregnant, progestin, The pill

item.title: Reintroduction
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Erika’s back from Sweden and just about healthy again! Yay! We’re now the middle of 2017 and, well, as of a few weeks ago, we’re now starting our FIFTH year of Oh Joy Sex Toy. It’s incredible. If you had told either of us at the start that we would both still be doing this […]
item.content:encoded:
Reintroduction

by Matthew Nolan on 05/30/2017 at 12:01 am
  • Adventures »
  • Comic »
  • Favorites

Erika’s back from Sweden and just about healthy again! Yay!

We’re now the middle of 2017 and, well, as of a few weeks ago, we’re now starting our FIFTH year of Oh Joy Sex Toy. It’s incredible. If you had told either of us at the start that we would both still be doing this full time after so many years, I don’t think either of us would have believed you. It’s amazing.

Need a catch up? Brand new here?
– Welp we’ve got about 100 sex ed comics here.
– These were our FAV toys at the end of 2016
– Erika did a 24 hour comic recently
– These are our personal favorite comics
– And, you can support us through Patreon, Kickstarter (24 hours left!), or by picking up some merch!

We’re so incredibly humbled by it all. We truly couldn’t do this without your support on Patreon, through Kickstarter or just in person, with your kind words.

We’re going to start ramping up back into our regular flow. Get some sex toys reviewed, talk some sex ed, hire guest artists. Maybe you couldn’t tell, but these past few months have been a whirlwind of sickness and overworking, so we’re both really looking forward to getting back into our routine.

In today’s strip, we both make light mention of our quirks; being bipolar and having anxiety issues. Well, if you’re looking for more on that, we do try to post about these things onto our more private space on Patreon, and will continue to try to use it as a place to over-share.

There’s just 24 hours left on the Kickstarter. Be a hero and get a booook while you still can at its cheapest!

└ Tags: erika, how does OJST work, introduction, Matthew, Reintroduction, roles, what do we do

item.content:encoded:
Practice by Redzonest

by Matthew Nolan on 05/23/2017 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Smutty Comics

2017’s been a bit tough on us so far – and Erika’s sick again after her amazing Sweden convention! Hopefully, we’ll be fit and healthy and back to reviewing toys in the next few weeks.

Thankfully we have this lovely comic by Redzonest to share with you. I think it’s really sweet and sexy. I hope you like it too! If it gets you interested in Rope Play, check out our Kink comics. Lucy’s and Abbys are both great comics in the same vein.

  • Redzonest
  • Twisted Monk Ropes

Also. It’s our LAST WEEK of the Kickstarter. This is your last chance to pick up a book and support the comic. Browse OJST with an adblocker-on, guilt free knowing you’ve supported us financially, AND get a sweet looking book. As of right now, there are STILL 3 Masturbateeer slots left!!!
